alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 5:11PM EDT until September 07 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Lancaster County in south central Pennsylvania... Southeastern York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 511 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Terre Hill to Gap to Delta, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Holland, Paradise, Reamstown, Quarryville, Gap, Adamstown, Terre Hill, Delta, Wakefield, Churchtown, Bareville and Bowmansville. This includes The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 284 to 295. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
